recipesJson.name: Blueberry Mourning
recipesJson.author: blakedennis87
recipesJson.description: One of the first recipes i did when i had about 10 flavors in stock. this recipe was an accident - trying to create something else and this batch reminded me of the blueberry morning cereal my parents had in the pantry. I think it could use a nice fresh milk flavor added to it.

reviews.text: Great recipe if you like your blueberry cereal super dark and jammy
